last_episode_to_air.name: Finale
last_episode_to_air.overview:
Jill rejects Kevin at the altar, but the two of them agree to continue their engagement.

Billie Jean says ""I do"" at the altar only to have Tony reject her. This action sets off a serious round of insults and disbelief, most by Billie Jean's family and friends.

The end of the episode recaps each couple and their current situation with each other.

Sean Valentine reveals that Jill and Kevin were voted by America to be the most likely couple (out of themselves and Billie Jean and Tony) to remain married, therefore making them eligible for the new house and $500,000 in the bank. In the end, since no marriage took place, the prize went unclaimed.

name: Married by America
overview: Married by America was a reality television program hosted by Los Angeles DJ Sean Valentine that aired in the United States on Fox in the spring of 2003. It was produced by the production company Rocket Science Laboratories.
